text: The MTV gang is back to take over Thursday nights with'Jersey Shore Family Vacation,'starting April 5. Pauly D, JWoww, Vinny, Ronnie, Snooki and The Situation are bringing the Jersey shore to Miami on April 5. MTV announced the premiere date — and a return to Thursday nights, reviving ` ` Jerzdays'' — along with a first look at the gang's highly anticipated TV reunion, Jersey Shore Family Vacation, on Wednesday. In hopes of getting viewers pumped for the revival, the Viacom - owned cable network revealed a peek at the new beach backdrop for the vacation spinoff, following a social media campaign that asked the audience to submit their picks using the hashtag # JSFAMILYVACATION.
